
# CE

## Number of trips 

```{r}
CEtr <- CE %>% 
  group_by(CEyear) %>%
  summarise(CEnumberOfFractionalTrips = sum(CEnumberOfFractionalTrips, na.rm = TRUE),
            CEnumDomTrip = sum(CEnumDomTrip, na.rm = TRUE))

CEtr1 <- gather(CEtr, NumberofTripsSource, NumberofTrips, -CEyear)

ggplot(CEtr1, aes(CEyear, NumberofTrips, fill = NumberofTripsSource)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge")

CEtr %>%
  datatable(extensions = 'Buttons',
            options = list(dom = 'Blfrtip',
                           buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel'),
                           lengthMenu = list(c(10,25,50,-1),
                                             c(10,25,50,"All"))))

```
```{r}
ggplot(CE, aes(CEnumberOfFractionalTrips, CEnumDomTrip)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid(.~CEyear)
```



## Fishing days 

```{r}
CEfd <- CE %>%
  group_by(CEyear) %>%
  summarise(CEsciFishDay = sum(CEsciFishDay, na.rm = TRUE))
```


```{r}
ggplot(CE, aes(CESciDaySea, CEsciFishDay)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid(.~CEyear)
```
